name: Escape From The NIGHTMARE! 1.5
description:
Escape From The NIGHTMARE!
In this game you must collect 5 golden keys to open the master door which is firmly sealed and escape from this place, BEFORE YOU...
In this latest version of the game, now you can choose a map / stage!.

!Game Trailer!


DOWNLOAD NOW!!!
Available for Android and Windows!!!
Android support : 4.4 - 11
Windows support : 7 - 10
Download now and get as many ending scores as possible!!!
